refnamediv.refpurpose: Command-line utility for adding records to an LDB

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: ldbadd adds records to an ldb(7) database. It reads the ldif(5) files specified on the command line and adds the records from these files to the LDB database, which is specified by the -H option or the LDB_URL environment variable.
If - is specified as a ldb file, the ldif input is read from standard input.

listitem.para: LDB URL to connect to. See ldb(7) for details.
LDB URL to connect to (can be overrided by using the -H command-line option.)
